Author: SheDontCarrie
Text: Thank you for the comment. It helps to hear that. Caffeine was seriously affecting my mood and I already have high anxiety so deep down I know I’m better off with little to none. To be honest I wish they were liquid happiness but I think I was worse off on energy drinks. The jaw clenching sounds super painful. Sending good thoughts.

Author: loversalibi
Text: honestly? you’re better off. i love my energy drinks but i can’t deny that the artificial sweeteners aren’t good for me. they may not cause cancer, but they’re not great for your teeth and the artificial sweeteners do seem to fuck me up with cravings for sweets. i wish i didn’t like them. i also have a jaw clenching issue and the extreme levels of caffeine make it so much worse and it hurts a lot. (coffee and tea still have less caffeine than your average energy drink.) so yeah. it’s probably for the best that you don’t drink that stuff, tbh.
